    "SdkAppId": 1400000000
}

Host: ccc.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: UnbindStaffSkillGroupList
<公共请求参数>

{
    "SdkAppId": 1400000000,
    "StaffEmail": "staff1@xxx.com",
    "SkillGroupList": [
        100,
        101
    ]
}
UnbindStaffSkillGroupList.title: 解绑坐席所属技能组示例

UpdateCCCSkillGroup.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ccc.tencentcloudapi.com

<公共请求参数>

{

    "MaxConcurrency": 1,
    "RingAll": true
}
UpdateCCCSkillGroup.title: 更新技能组信息

UpdatePredictiveDialingCampaign.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1

<公共请求参数>

{
    "SdkAppId": 1400000000,
    "CampaignId": 2569,
    "Name": "新能源SUV推荐",
    "Callees": [
        "+8613012345678",

        "+8613012345670"
    ],
    "Callers": [
        "0086075586013388"
    ],
    "CallOrder": 0,
    "SkillGroupId": 255,
    "IVRId": 4600,
    "Priority": 3,
    "ExpectedAbandonRate": 10,
    "RetryTimes": 1,
    "RetryInterval": 1800,
    "StartTime": 1708483433,
    "EndTime": 1708485433
}
UpdatePredictiveDialingCampaign.title: 更新预测式外呼任务示例
